meanings.definition: The act of attending a movie theater to watch a film.
meanings.sent1: My moviegoings always involve buying popcorn and finding the best seat in the theater.
meanings.sent2: Her moviegoings with friends are a fun way to spend the weekend.
meanings.sent3: During my moviegoings, I accidentally sat in the wrong theater and watched a comedy instead of a thriller!
meanings.sent4: His moviegoings were like a journey through different worlds, each film a new adventure.
meanings.sent5: The excitement of moviegoings makes the stories on screen come alive in a magical way.

meanings.definition: The practice or habit of regularly going to see movies.
meanings.sent1: My moviegoings have led me to discover a love for classic films.
meanings.sent2: Their moviegoings every Friday night have become a cherished tradition.
meanings.sent3: His moviegoings are so frequent that he can recite lines from his favorite movies by heart!
meanings.sent4: In her moviegoings, she collects ticket stubs as souvenirs of the films she has seen.
meanings.sent5: The joy of moviegoings is like a comforting routine in the midst of a busy week.
